Field.name: Description
Field.p: Timestamp on the topology from which this metric was obtained. For headroom metrics this is the time at which the headroom plan was created.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Oid of the entity to which the metric applies.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Oid of the seller of this commodity.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: The commodity key. This value can be null if no key is present.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Current utilization of the commodity on the selling entity

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Capacity of the commodity on the selling entity

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Utilization of the commodity on the selling entity.

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Amount of the commodity currently used by the buying entity

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Peak amount of the commodity of the selling entity

Field.name: Description
Field.p: Peak amount of the commodity currently used by the buying entity

Field.name: Description
Field.p: The type of the entity in the entity_oid column.
